content: What is the formula for adding the suffix "-ful" to the word "help" to make it "helpful"?

To add the suffix "-ful" to the word "help" and form "helpful," you simply attach the suffix directly to the base word without any modifications. So, the formula can be expressed as:

Base Word + Suffix = New Word

Help + -ful = Helpful

In this case, the base word "help" remains unchanged and the suffix "-ful" is added directly to it.
